name: Elven Song
effects: Increase all stats by 90% for 3 turns to all allies while singing
Restore 1350 (+10x, Heal) HP split over 3 turns to all allies while singing
Restore 30 (+0.6x, Heal) MP split over 3 turns to all allies while singing

name: Elven Song
精靈之歌
엘프의 노래
Chanson elfique
Elfenlied
Balada élfica
desc_short: Gradually restore HP and MP for all allies while singing, and boost ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR
歌唱期間持續恢復全體隊員HP、MP+提高攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值
노래하는 동안 아군 전체의 HP와 MP 서서히 회복+공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력 상승
Restaure progressivement les PV et les PM de tous les alliés en chantant, et augmente ATT/DEF/MAGIE/PSY
ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY hoch, alle Verb. während das Lied andauert und stellt allmählich LP und MP wieder her
Recupera poco a poco VIT y PM de todos los aliados al cantar, aumenta ATQ/DEF/MAG/ESP
desc_long: Gradually restores HP and MP for all allies while singing, and boosts ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR.
歌唱期間持續恢復全體隊員HP、MP，並提高攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值。
노래하는 동안 아군 전체의 HP와 MP를 서서히 회복하고, 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력이 상승합니다.
Restaure progressivement les PV et les PM de tous les alliés en chantant, et augmente l'ATT, la DEF, la MAGIE et la PSY.
ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY hoch, alle Verb. während das Lied andauert und stellt allmählich LP und MP wieder her
Recupera poco a poco la VIT y los PM de todos los aliados al cantar, aumenta el ATQ, la DEF, la MAG y el ESP.
